root: ^Hello again, Bard. What did you want to talk about?

s: ^I wanted to know more about the town.
^Do you still need some Blue Ale? Is there anyway I can help out?
^I talked to Agatha, and she mentioned that you were an adventurer. Is that why you have that sword up there?

PathA: ^Oh yes, you asked about that earlier. I'm afraid there isn't much to say really, but you can talk to Brom and Aden over there.
^Aden is always up for a chat, and Brom, well... Brom has some issues, but he's a nice guy deep down. I look forward to your performance later tonight.
PathB: ^Actually, could you manage the bar for 5 minutes? It would really help me out. we've only got 3 flavours of Ale at the moment, the patrons will ask for what they want. I'll be back in a few.
PathC: ^It's from my time as an adventurer.
^I don't like talking about it, but years ago, before I opened the Tavern, I was known as The Blade. I did a lot of work around the kingdom and became somewhat well known but...
^well, I gave that life up... enjoy your Ale.
